body.name: Vermont Castile Soap Unscented, Gentle Liquid Soap for Sensitive Skin & Natural Body Wash, Organic Hair Shampoo for Oily Hair, Aloe Castile Soap for Men & Women - Gallon
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 49 mins
features: USDA ORGANIC: AUDITED NATURAL FARM TO BOTTLE: Master Soapmakers at Vermont liquid Soap craft this high quality unscented castile soap liquid from strictly natural and organic ethically sourced ingredients to bring you a mild and gentle skin feel unheard of in mass market petrochemical detergent products. Our organic castile soap is great for sensitive skin and the most discerning customers.

CONCENTRATED ALL PURPOSE CLEANER: Our multipurpose Castile soap liquid can be used to clean everything! Use pure-castile liquid soap as a dish soap, body wash, shampoo, baby soap, veggie wash, laundry detergent, dishwashing soap, car wash, floor cleaners, and pet shampoo. With our concentrated Castile Soap, a little goes a long way.
GREAT FOR YOUR BODY, HOME AND PLANET Vermont Soap pure castile soap is made of natural vegan ingredients, and is fully biodegradable making it safe for your body, your home and our environment.

NO HARSH CHEMICALS: Our pure castile soap unscented is 100% Vegan, Glutan-free, cruelty-free, and we dont test on animals. We never use sulfates, chemicals detergents, petrochemicals, artificial colors, fragrances, animal by-products, or other harsh chemicals.

GIVING BACK TO THE PLANET: Vermont Soap are master soap makers for 30 years. Since 1992 they are crafting premium certified organic castile soap. Our concentrated formula reduces plastic waste, and we give one percent to the planet, Vermont Soap helps the community in every possible way. If you're not completely satisifed with your unscented castile soap, we'll make it right.
body.description: At Vermont Soap we've been passionately crafting high-quality ethically sourced organic and natural castile liquid soaps since 1992. We are USDA organic certified manufacturer and track ingredients from farm to bottle making sure our products are truly organic. Our plant powered Vermont castile liquid soaps work great as a body wash, shampoo for oily hair, and as an all purpose household cleaner. Vermont Castile Liquid Soaps are made of ingredients that are carefully chosen and developed into a premium quality product for men and women with dry and sensitive skin. Our perfectly balanced body washes for men formula leaves no residues or lingering scent, only clean, smooth, moisturized healthy-looking skin. Our body wash men and women is also mild enough for everyday use. We do not test on animals, use no chemicals, have no phthalates, are glutan-free and are vegan. We give 1% of our profits to the Planet and our factury uses Solar Power. We Promise, if you are not completely satisfied, reach out to us and we'll make it right. Features:Relieves dry skin, Moisturizes skinFor Normal and Senstive SkinFor Oily Hair ShampooTruly Organic with USDA Organic CertificationEffortless dispensingPackage Includes: Vermont Castile Soap Simply Unscented - Gallon x 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I prefer liquid soap like this to harsh bar soap, when taking a shower. This is good quality natural soap that gets you squeaky clean without all those bad chemicals.Unfortunately this brand didn't have an unscented option, so the only scent that doesn't make me smell too unmanly is the Patchouli Rose. The scent is quite strong, but not overpowering, so I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product, I’ve used it in various capacities such as wood cleaner, floor cleaner and detergent. It has a great smell (lemongrass) and works well. Wish it came in a larger bottle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars no dry, cracked hands!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this soap to save money and have soap constantly available without having to buy a new soap every week. I use a little of this diluted with water, and lately I have been adding essential oils to it as well for variety. Clove oil is a lovely addition to the orange, and also frankincense and myrhh is fun! The soap is lovely in a foaming soap dispenser, and it can be diluted very heavily (I use only a couple of tablespoons in an 8-oz dispenser), so it is economical. But best of all, the first winter I had this soap was the first time I ever got through a whole winter with no cracked hands! I am thrilled! Castile soap seems to much healthier than others, and this one is a lovely scent and a nice bargain size. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good. Lovely scent, but seems already diluted.
reviews.reviewText: Very thin - this is already diluted - you wouldn't want to dilute it any further - that's the reason for the lost star. But the scent is very lovely on the skin. It does smell a little weird while you're washing with it, but the scent it leaves is heavenly. I feel it's a little too pricey for how thin it was - if it was like most other castile soaps that I've used and a bit thicker in viscosity/strength, it would be a 5 star product. But if you like the scents of both patchouli and rose, this really does shine in this product. I know some folks have said it's hard to smell the rose - it is a bit hard to detect it during washing, but again, where this one shines is the scent it leaves behind, and you can very definitely smell a perfect blend of rose and patchouli once you're done washing. Note: I've only used it for hand washing and as a bodywash, and it's perfect for that even if it's a bit thin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very concentrated, lovely scent, exceptional product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells amazing (if you like essential oils) but does NOT cut grease for dishes.
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing (if you like essential oils) but does NOT cut grease for dishes. It's very runny and I have to use 2-3 times the amount to get my dishes clean. I did not use it for any of the other purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This soap is awesome! It has great ingredients and the smell is so minty! It’s also very versatile, have used it for cleaning the floor, counters, dishes, hands you name it. I will be continuing to purchase it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for DIY Body Wash
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to start my DIY body wash. It has a pleasant like scent. I really love this product! I will continue using this product!
